biotools.summary: mGenomeSubtractor performs mpiBLAST-based comparison of reference bacterial genomes against multiple user-selected genomes. Such in silico subtractive hybridization also allows for definition of species-specific gene pools and can be used to develop genomic arrays.

bioschemas.name: mGenomeSubtractor
bioschemas.summary: mGenomeSubtractor performs mpiBLAST-based comparison of reference bacterial genomes against multiple user-selected genomes. Such in silico subtractive hybridization also allows for definition of species-specific gene pools and can be used to develop genomic arrays.
